author: Andy Pearson
description: A combination of the El-Presidente and Negroni. A cocktail on the bitter side of bittersweet which is perhaps best served on-the-rocks.
name: Mr President
recipeIngredient: 37.5 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
